Package org.opengrok.indexer.search

Class DirectoryEntry

java.lang.Object
org.opengrok.indexer.search.DirectoryEntry
public class DirectoryEntry extends Object
Represents a pairing of File along with supplemental NullableNumLinesLOC.

  • Constructor Summary

    Initializes an instance with a specified, required File.

    Initializes an instance with a specified, required File and a possible NullableNumLinesLOC.
